title: Freemake Video Converter Gold 4.1.7.0 + Serial key
description:
Freemake Video Converter - Convert video free to AVI, MP4, WMV, MKV, 3GP, DVD, MP3, iPad, iPhone, PSP, Android phones. Video to MP3 with one click! Rip & burn DVD. Convert YouTube to MP4, AVI, etc. with Freemake! Guaranteed result.



Features:

Free & Safe Video Converter - Over 300,000,000 people worldwide trust Freemake Video Converter to encode their video files. It's free, safe, and absolutely easy to use. You just install it to your PC, add files, choose a format, and get what you want free & fast. The software is regularly updated and optimized for all Windows OS's. 

300+ Input Formats - The video converter supports nearly all known media formats. Add video files: AVI, MP4, MKV, WMV, MPG, 3GP, 3G2, SWF, FLV, TOD, AVCHD, MOV, DV, RM, QT, TS, MTS, Fraps, etc. Import music (MP3, AAC, WMA, WAV), and photos (JPG, BMP, PNG,GIF) to turn them into video free and easily! See supported formats 

Convert Online Videos to MP3 - Download and convert streaming videos from YouTube, Vimeo,Dailymotion and 50+ sites. Select output quality and transform online videos to MP3, AVI, MP4, WMV, iPhone, Android. The easiest way to transfer YouTube to iTunes. Or extract sound from offline videos by converting them to MP3 format, e.g. turn MP4 to MP3, FLV to MP3. 

Convert to AVI, MP4, MKV, FLV, 3GP, MP3, HTML5 - Convert files into a wide range of major video formats such as AVI, WMV, MP4, MPEG, MKV, FLV, SWF, 3GP. All modern video codecs are included. Convert AVI to MP4, MKV to MP4, MP4 to AVI, WMV to AVI, 3GP to AVI, etc. Rip unprotected DVDs with subtitles. Convert videos to Flash or HTML5 & get code ready for integration into your site or blog. 

Get Videos Ready for iOS, Android, PSP, Xbox - Prepare videos for playback on any portable device. Convert videos for iPhone 1-6G, all iPod models, iPad 1-5G, all Android gadgets, most BlackBerry, Samsung, Sony, Nokia phones. Optimize videos for Sony PSP, PS Vita, PS3, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Apple TV, PlayBook. Get started in seconds by choosing a profile optimised for your gadget. 

CUDA and DXVA Support - Freemake Video Converter exclusively features CUDA and DXVA support for speedy video conversion. The program automatically detects the optimal conversion parameters and switches on/off CUDA and DXVA for better conversion results and less CPU usage. 

Burn DVD and Blu-ray - up to 40 hours! - Convert your movies to DVD or Blu-ray format and burn DVD or BD discs of high quality. Choose a stylish DVD menu and burn up to 40h of video. Save output as ISO image or DVD / Blu-ray folder on your hard drive. Choose a ready DVD menu template and burn DVDs with stylish menus for any occasion. 

HD Video Converter - This is a free video converter for your videos in high definition 720p, 1080p, 1080i coming from Blu-ray discs or HD camcorders. Change the formats MTS, TS, M2TS, TOD, MOV, AVCHD into the most popular AVI, MP4 and MKV without quality loss. 

Free Subtitles Support - Convert videos with subtitles to any format or device. Import subtitles from the Internet. Adjust subtitles size and font. SRT, ASS, SSA and Unicode subtitles are supported! 

Advanced Preset Editor - Freemake Video Converter offers 200+ ready presets for all your needs. The default options fit the majority of input videos. Still advanced users may modify parameters and create custom presets. Set custom video and audio codecs, resolution, bitrate, frame rate, etc. and save your preset for further usage. 

Free Upload to YouTube - Upload videos, DVD, photo slideshows and MP3 visuallizations to YouTube for free. The program will cut videos (if required) into 15-minute parts and insert them into one YouTube playlist. 

Make Slideshows and Visualizations - Turn photos or images into slideshows with background music for free. Edit your slideshow: add, delete, and shuffle photos, enable panorama effect. Add audio files and create beautiful music visualizations. Free templates! 

Cut, Join, Rotate, Limit file size - Cut video parts from your file. Rotate video 90 and 180 degrees. Join several videos into one file, add transitions between parts. Fit the output file size to any limit (e.g. 700 Mb, 1.4 Gb, 4.7 Gb). Auto-delete black bars from your video.


	
Homepage: http://www.freemake.com/free_video_converter/
Changelog: http://www.freemake.com/freemake_video_converter_changelog/

Released Date: 2015-08-25
OS: XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
Language: Multilingual
Installer (28.61 MB)



Note: Turn off your internet connection before entering the keys.
